header.text: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

terms_of_use_text.helper_text:
Terms of Use

1. Introduction

Welcome to [Your App Name]. By using our app, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, please do not use our app.

2. Use of the App

You must be at least [minimum age] years old to use this app.

You agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the app.

3. Permissions

Our app requires the following permissions to function properly:

  • USB Permission: To access USB devices such as cameras.
  • Bluetooth Permission: For Bluetooth connectivity features.
  • Location Permission: To provide location-based services.
  • SIM Number for OTP: To verify your phone number via OTP (One Time Password).
  • Camera and Storage Permission: To enable video calling and manage media files.
  • Notification Permission: To send notifications.
  • Background Permission: To run services in the background for uninterrupted functionality.

4. User Responsibilities

You are responsible for keeping your device and app access secure.

You must not misuse our app by knowingly introducing viruses, trojans, or other malicious material.

5. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your access to the app immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms.

Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy explains how [Your App Name] collects, uses, and discloses information about you when you use our app.

2. Information Collection

Personal Information: We may collect information such as your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.

Permissions:

  • USB Permission: To access and control USB devices.
  • Bluetooth Permission: To connect with Bluetooth devices.
  • Location Permission: To provide location-based services.
  • SIM Number for OTP: To verify your identity using your phone number.
  • Camera and Storage Permission: To enable video calls and manage media files.
  • Notification Permission: To send notifications regarding app activities.
  • Background Permission: To run essential services in the background.

3. Use of Information

Personal Information: To create and manage your account, provide customer support, and improve our services.

Permissions:

  • USB and Camera: To enable video calling features.
  • Bluetooth: To connect and communicate with Bluetooth devices.
  • Location: To offer location-based services.
  • SIM Number: To send OTPs for verification.
  • Storage: To save and access media files.
  • Notifications: To keep you informed about app updates and activities.
  • Background Services: To ensure smooth app functionality even when running in the background.

4. Sharing of Information

We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

5. Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

6. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

7. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].

Conclusion

By using our app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and the terms outlined in the Terms of Use.
